description: two studies of Mary and infant Jesus at left; study with two heads at center; arm and head and right; head turned to PR at top center; very light sketch of seated figure on back
inscription:

on verso, in pen and brown ink: [Anto. Alegri da Coregio]

title: Studies of the Madonna and Child
